author: billbarker
msg: Only build ApacheConfig and friends for TC 5.

author: billbarker
msg: Repackaging ApacheConfig and friends for Tomcat 5.

This is a straight re-packaging, no change in functionality.  I want to make it JMX-aware eventually (so you can do an all-in-one config al la TC 3.3).  However, it's not a reason to hold up a release.

author: billbarker
msg: You'll need some pretty high-end hardware to see this in the real world, but it's still technically a bug.

author: markt
msg: - The word 'notice' is incorrectly repeated in condition 1. It appears once at the end of the first line and is immediately repeated at the start of the second. This patch removes the repeated word.
